paramInformation.label: Latch Hold Time
paramInformation.description: Defines how long the latch is kept open.

paramInformation.label: Latch Torque
paramInformation.description: Defines the torque of the latch.

paramInformation.label: Acoustic Feedback
paramInformation.description: Defines Acoustic Feedback signals. Button-, Low-Battery-, Error- and Alarm-Signals can not be adjusted.

options.label: Only at the beginning of the lock travel
When reaching the position of the event

paramInformation.label: Travel Time
paramInformation.description: This parameter defines the travel path of the Lock.

options.label: Multiple turns for one Open/Close action
Travel from window-tilted position is turned on (ABUS FCA3000)

paramInformation.label: Touch Panel Settings
paramInformation.description: This parameter defines Touch Panel settings.

options.label: Only Touch Panel Control Buttons are active

paramInformation.label: Motor Force
paramInformation.description: This parameter defines the motor force, when turning the lock.

paramInformation.label: Drive cycles Trap
paramInformation.description: Counter, how often the trap was activated.

paramInformation.label: Driving cycles unlocked
paramInformation.description: Counter, how often it has been unlocked.

paramInformation.label: Driving cycles interlocked
paramInformation.description: Counter, how often it has been interlocked.

paramInformation.label: ABUS Firmware Version
paramInformation.description: Version of the ABUS Firmware, e.g. 1.05
